mapper.sql: id, code, rest_url, method, description, dr, ts
mapper.insert:
insert into T_ANCS_SYSTEM_REST
id,
code,
rest_url,
method,
description,
dr,
ts,

insert into T_ANCS_SYSTEM_REST (id, code, rest_url, method, description, dr, ts) values
(#{rest.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rest.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rest.restUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rest.method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rest.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rest.dr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rest.ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update T_ANCS_SYSTEM_REST
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rest_url = #{restUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ts = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select p.* from T_ANCS_SYSTEM_DOMAIN u LEFT JOIN T_ANCS_SYSTEM_DOMAIN_DOMAIN_ROLE sru on u.ID= sru.domain_id LEFT JOIN T_ANCS_SYSTEM_DOMAIN_ROLE r on sru.domain_role_id=r.ID LEFT JOIN T_ANCS_SYSTEM_DOMAIN_ROLE_REST spr on spr.role_id=r.ID LEFT JOIN T_ANCS_SYSTEM_REST p on p.ID =spr.rest_id where u.id=#{domainId}
